etymology.description: 巴(巴) (bā, "to cling; a surname") is often used as a proper noun or surname, and 金(金) (jīn, "gold; metal") is also commonly used as a surname or to represent wealth or value.
etymology.interpretation: 巴金(Bā Jīn) is a well-known pen name of the famed 20th-century Chinese writer. The pen name reflects both personal identity as a surname and the value or richness associated with his literary contributions.

examples.chinese: 我经常阅读巴金的小说(我經常閱讀巴金的小說)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jīngcháng yuèdú Bā Jīn de xiǎoshuō.
examples.english: I often read Ba Jin's novels.

examples.chinese: 巴金的作品深刻(巴金的作品深刻)，影响了一代人(影響了一代人)。
examples.pinyin: Bā Jīn de zuòpǐn shēnkè, yǐngxiǎngle yī dài rén.
examples.english: Ba Jin's works are profound and have influenced a generation.

examples.chinese: 我在讲座中听到巴金的演讲(我在講座中聽到巴金的演講)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zài jiǎngzuò zhōng tīngdào Bā Jīn de yǎnjiǎng.
examples.english: I heard Ba Jin's speech at the lecture.
